author: smuzaffar
body:
After moving to ROOT 6.36, DQM bin-by-bin comparison was failing (see #49452). As [suggested by root team](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/49452#issuecomment-3576266582), we can directory get and use the  values instead of creating a numpy array. This PR implements that suggestion and also adds a unit tests to make sure the compareHistograms.py runs as expected.

Fixes #49452
title: Fix compareHistograms.py: use values directory instead of numpy.array
